# rect(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns an anchor source rect defined by `r` in the current view.

## Declaration

```swift
static func rect(_ r: CGRect) -> Anchor<Value>.Source
```

## Getting rectangle anchor sources

- **bounds**: An anchor source rect defined as the entire bounding rect of the current view.

items.description: An anchor source rect defined as the entire bounding rect of the current view.
